brief.brief: The name of the standard form to display to the user when this script runs.

detail.detail: The input fields displayed on all forms within a script flow relate to one dbdict (problem, cm3r, configuration item, etc.).

You can use $ variables in any script form. However, if you want to retain their values in the $script file variable, you must create the necessary Format Control statements to copy the variables to input fields.
Even though a script uses a form, it can be elsewhere in Service Manager.
